dmca.title: [TP-C329801Z] Earth-accents.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Posted At: Tuesday, August 01, 2006 9:45 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [TP-C329801Z] Earth-accents.com
Subject: [TP-C329801Z] Earth-accents.com


From: abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: [TP-C329801Z] Earth-accents.com
Reference: [TP-C329801Z]

For your review. 

Thank you, 

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc. 
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

MIME element (text/plain)
I notified abuse@siteground.com of copyright and registered trademark
violations on the above listed site on 7/27. They have not responded
except to tell me in live chat that they are "working" on it which would
be completed "two business days" from the 27th. Those two days have
passed. 
 
You and each of you are hereby notified that my copyrighted and
registered materials are posted on the above website without
authorization. Please take whatever actions are necessary to cease these
copyright violation. 
 
As a long time netizen, going all the way back to arpanet, a sysadmin
and website host I regret having to involve all of you, however no good
can come of this continued misuse of our materials. 
 
Cordially 
 
 
R. K. "Bob" Clark, Jr. 
Operations Manager
Ecotimber
1611 Fourth Street
San Rafael, CA 94901
(415) 258-8454 ext. 200
(415) 258-8455
